message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, considering its value and uniqueness.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you consider meeting me in the middle at $12500?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to negotiate further. However, I'm not comfortable going all the way down to $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer, so I'll propose a new price of $13750. This is still a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but $13750 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $11000. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it if we can meet on this price.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I'm not comfortable going below $13000. I'll propose a new price of $13200. This is still a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but $13200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $13200 and my last offer of $11000, which would be $12100. I'm hoping we can meet on this price.
